title: [Admission] seniors, rvce aiml through comedk or pes aiml through kcet?

comments.body: Both have it's pros and cons, afaik rvce infrastructure is ass, they have a lot of clash between RVU students, the RVU one's getting more access to better facilities even tho they haven't gotten in through merit, but academics r slightly more chill than PES. infrastructure in PES is far superior but ud be having a lot more competition here compared to RVCE
